resources.string: Monitor foreground app switches and report to Sleepy server
Configure your Sleepy server connection. This Xposed module will automatically report your device status and current app to the server.

Instructions:
1. Fill in your Sleepy server base URL (e.g., https://sleepy.example.com)
2. Enter your server secret key
3. Set a unique device ID
4. Choose a display name for this device
5. Enable reporting with the switch
6. Save and reboot your device
7. Enable this module in LSPosed/Xposed and select 'System Framework' as scope

Note: The module only works when enabled in Xposed/LSPosed manager.
Configuration saved successfully!\n\nPlease reboot your device for changes to take effect.
